attributes.action: accept that the votes cast for this Government in the last election represent less than 23% of the electorate and therefore this Government has no mandate to rule
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last election saw the Government win less than 23% of the votes of the total electorate and indeed a minority of the votes cast in England. The number of seats won by the Government does not represent its achievement at the polls and the Government has no mandate to rule.
